ayahs.textUthmani: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: عَيْنًۭا [A spring ] يَشْرَبُ [will drink] بِهَا [from it] عِبَادُ [(the) slaves] ٱللَّهِ [(of) Allah] يُفَجِّرُونَهَا [causing it to gush forth] تَفْجِيرًۭا [abundantly]
ayahs.transliteration: AAaynan yashrabu biha AAibaduAllahi yufajjiroonaha tafjeera

ayahs.textUthmani: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: يُوفُونَ [They fulfill] بِٱلنَّذْرِ [the vows] وَيَخَافُونَ [and fear] يَوْمًۭا [a Day ] كَانَ [(which) is] شَرُّهُۥ [its evil] مُسْتَطِيرًۭا [widespread]
ayahs.transliteration: Yoofoona binnathri wayakhafoonayawman kana sharruhu mustateera

ayahs.textUthmani: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَيُطْعِمُونَ [And they feed] ٱلطَّعَامَ [the food] عَلَىٰ [in spite of] حُبِّهِۦ [love (for) it] مِسْكِينًۭا [(to the) needy] وَيَتِيمًۭا [and (the) orphan] وَأَسِيرًا [and (the) captive]
ayahs.transliteration: WayutAAimona attaAAamaAAala hubbihi miskeenan wayateeman waaseera

ayahs.textUthmani: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنَّمَا [Only] نُطْعِمُكُمْ [we feed you] لِوَجْهِ [for (the) Countenance] ٱللَّهِ [(of) Allah] لَا [Not] نُرِيدُ [we desire] مِنكُمْ [from you] جَزَآءًۭ [any reward] وَلَا [and not] شُكُورًا [thanks]
ayahs.transliteration: Innama nutAAimukum liwajhi Allahila nureedu minkum jazaan wala shukoora

ayahs.textUthmani: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنَّا [Indeed, we] نَخَافُ [fear] مِن [from] رَّبِّنَا [our Lord] يَوْمًا [a Day ] عَبُوسًۭا [harsh] قَمْطَرِيرًۭا [and distressful]
ayahs.transliteration: Inna nakhafu min rabbinayawman AAaboosan qamtareera

ayahs.textUthmani: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
ayahs.wordByWord: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ [But will protect them] ٱللَّهُ [Allah] شَرَّ [(from the) evil] ذَٰلِكَ [(of) that] ٱلْيَوْمِ [Day] وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ [and will cause them to meet] نَضْرَةًۭ [radiance] وَسُرُورًۭا [and happiness]
ayahs.transliteration: Fawaqahumu Allahu sharra thalikaalyawmi walaqqahum nadratan wasuroora

words.translation: and will cause them to meet

ayahs.textUthmani: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَجَزَىٰهُم [And will reward them] بِمَا [because] صَبَرُوا۟ [they were patient] جَنَّةًۭ [(with) a Garden] وَحَرِيرًۭا [and silk]
ayahs.transliteration: Wajazahum bima sabaroojannatan wahareera

ayahs.textUthmani: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ [Reclining] فِيهَا [therein] عَلَى [on] ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ [couches] لَا [Not] يَرَوْنَ [they will see] فِيهَا [therein] شَمْسًۭا [sun] وَلَا [and not] زَمْهَرِيرًۭا [freezing cold]
ayahs.transliteration: Muttaki-eena feeha AAala al-ara-ikila yarawna feeha shamsan wala zamhareera

ayahs.textUthmani: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَـٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَدَانِيَةً [And near] عَلَيْهِمْ [above them] ظِلَـٰلُهَا [(are) its shades] وَذُلِّلَتْ [and will hang low] قُطُوفُهَا [its cluster of fruits] تَذْلِيلًۭا [dangling low]
ayahs.transliteration: Wadaniyatan AAalayhim thilaluhawathullilat qutoofuha tathleela

ayahs.textUthmani: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠
ayahs.wordByWord: وَيُطَافُ [And will be circulated] عَلَيْهِم [among them] بِـَٔانِيَةٍۢ [vessels] مِّن [of] فِضَّةٍۢ [silver] وَأَكْوَابٍۢ [and cups] كَانَتْ [(that) are] قَوَارِيرَا۠ [(of) crystal]
ayahs.transliteration: Wayutafu AAalayhim bi-aniyatinmin fiddatin waakwabin kanat qawareera

ayahs.textUthmani: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَوَارِيرَا۟ [Crystal-clear] مِن [of] فِضَّةٍۢ [silver] قَدَّرُوهَا [They will determine its] تَقْدِيرًۭا [measure]
ayahs.transliteration: Qawareera min fiddatinqaddarooha taqdeera

ayahs.textUthmani: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَيُسْقَوْنَ [And they will be given to drink] فِيهَا [therein] كَأْسًۭا [a cup ] كَانَ [is] مِزَاجُهَا [its mixture] زَنجَبِيلًا [(of) Zanjabil]
ayahs.transliteration: Wayusqawna feeha ka/san kanamizajuha zanjabeela

words.translation: And they will be given to drink

ayahs.textUthmani: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
ayahs.wordByWord: عَيْنًۭا [A spring] فِيهَا [therein] تُسَمَّىٰ [named] سَلْسَبِيلًۭا [Salsabil]
ayahs.transliteration: AAaynan feeha tusammasalsabeela

ayahs.textUthmani: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
ayahs.wordByWord: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ [And will circulate] عَلَيْهِمْ [among them] وِلْدَٰنٌۭ [young boys] مُّخَلَّدُونَ [made eternal] إِذَا [When] رَأَيْتَهُمْ [you see them] حَسِبْتَهُمْ [you would think them] لُؤْلُؤًۭا [(to be) pearls] مَّنثُورًۭا [scattered]
ayahs.transliteration: Wayatoofu AAalayhim wildanunmukhalladoona itha raaytahum hasibtahum lu/lu-anmanthoora

ayahs.textUthmani: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَإِذَا [And when] رَأَيْتَ [you look] ثَمَّ [then] رَأَيْتَ [you will see] نَعِيمًۭا [blessings] وَمُلْكًۭا [and a kingdom] كَبِيرًا [great]
ayahs.transliteration: Wa-itha raayta thamma raaytanaAAeeman wamulkan kabeera

ayahs.textUthmani: عَـٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
ayahs.wordByWord: عَـٰلِيَهُمْ [Upon them] ثِيَابُ [(will be) garments] سُندُسٍ [(of) fine silk] خُضْرٌۭ [green] وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌۭ ۖ [and heavy brocade] وَحُلُّوٓا۟ [And they will be adorned] أَسَاوِرَ [(with) bracelets] مِن [of] فِضَّةٍۢ [silver] وَسَقَىٰهُمْ [and will give them to drink] رَبُّهُمْ [their Lord] شَرَابًۭا [a drink] طَهُورًا [pure]
ayahs.transliteration: AAaliyahum thiyabu sundusinkhudrun wa-istabraqun wahulloo asawira minfiddatin wasaqahum rabbuhum sharaban tahoora

words.translation: and will give them to drink

ayahs.textUthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] هَـٰذَا [this] كَانَ [is] لَكُمْ [for you] جَزَآءًۭ [a reward] وَكَانَ [and has been] سَعْيُكُم [your effort] مَّشْكُورًا [appreciated]
ayahs.transliteration: Inna hatha kana lakum jazaanwakana saAAyukum mashkoora

ayahs.textUthmani: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًا
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنَّا [Indeed, We] نَحْنُ [[We]] نَزَّلْنَا [[We] revealed] عَلَيْكَ [to you] ٱلْقُرْءَانَ [the Quran] تَنزِيلًۭا [progressively]
ayahs.transliteration: Inna nahnu nazzalnaAAalayka alqur-ana tanzeela

ayahs.textUthmani: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
ayahs.wordByWord: فَٱصْبِرْ [So be patient] لِحُكْمِ [for (the) Command] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] وَلَا [and (do) not] تُطِعْ [obey] مِنْهُمْ [from them] ءَاثِمًا [any sinner] أَوْ [or] كَفُورًۭا [disbeliever]
ayahs.transliteration: Fasbir lihukmi rabbikawala tutiAA minhum athiman aw kafoora

ayahs.textUthmani: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَٱذْكُرِ [And remember] ٱسْمَ [(the) name] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] بُكْرَةًۭ [morning] وَأَصِيلًۭا [and evening]
ayahs.transliteration: Wathkuri isma rabbikabukratan waaseela
